subject: Mental Health
title: Exposure Therapy
description: A fast breakdown of Exposure Therapy for builders.

hook.text: The most counterintuitive anxiety treatment is facing the fear head-on.

buildup.text: Exposure therapy gradually introduces the feared situation in safe doses.

discovery.text: The brain learns that the expected catastrophe never actually happens.

twist.text: Avoidance feeds anxiety; exposure starves it over time.

climax.text: Virtual reality now lets patients face phobias in controlled digital worlds.

punchline.text: Facing the fear is the fastest path through it.

quiz.question: Why does avoidance worsen anxiety?
options: It reinforces the brain's belief that the threat is real
It has no effect on anxiety
